Cryptography is more than a buzzword. XRPL is a cryptographic system. Accounts are identified by cryptographic identities. Transactions are authorized by cryptographic signatures matching these identities. Users can cryptographically sign txns to access & transfer almost anything

The XRP Ledger is a cryptographic system. Accounts are identified by cryptographic identities. Transactions are authorized by cryptographic signatures matching these identities. Users can cryptographically sign txns to access and transfer almost anything.https://tiffanyhayden.blog/2018/03/28/xrp-is-a-cryptocurrency/ …
I don’t think Bitcoin will ever be used for institutional payments (corporates send them out in trillions) but individuals will continue to use Bitcoin for payments. I will, anyway.

The XRP Ledger is a cryptographic system. Accounts are identified by cryptographic identities. Transactions are authorized by cryptographic signatures matching these identities. Users can cryptographically sign txns to access and transfer almost anything.https://tiffanyhayden.blog/2018/03/28/xrp-is-a-cryptocurrency/ …
Ripple is a private company. XRP is a cryptocurrency and a digital asset. All cryptocurrencies are digital assets. https://tiffanyhayden.blog/2018/03/28/xrp-is-a-cryptocurrency/ …

So, keep in mind that I’m an outsider and this is just my perspective. Banks, along with every type of payment provider, are encouraged to join RippleNet for access to liquidity. Banks don’t have to know if XRP was used by a market maker. Some banks will become market makers.
